original_text: So Ruth gleaned in the field until evening. Then she threshed the barley she had gathered, and it amounted to about an ephah.
korean_text: 룻이 밭에서 저녁까지 줍고 그 주운 것을 떠니 보리가 한 에바쯤 되는지라

sentences.original_text: So Ruth gleaned in the field
Then she threshed the barley she had gathered
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그녀는 모은 보리를 타작했고

sentences.original_text: and it amounted to about an ephah
